Title.Language: Doxology for St. John the Baptist

Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. John the Baptist:

Text.Language: Mpe ouon twnf qen nijinmici: n~te nihiomi efo~ni m~mok: n~yok ounis] qen n/e#y#u# t/rou: Iwann/c piref]wmc.
Among those born of women, no one is like you, you are great among all the saints, O John the Baptist.
لم يقم فى مواليد النساء من يشبهك أنت عظيم فى جميع القديسين يا يوحنا المعمدان.
Nyok ouhouo~ m~p~rov/t/c: ak[ici qen ]meym/i: n~yok pe p~s~v/r m~pipatselet: pihi/b n~te V].
You are much more than a prophet, exalted in righteousness, you are the partner of the Bridegroom, the Lamb of God.
أنت أفضل من نبى تعاليت فى البر أنت هو صديق الختن حمل الله.
Akermeyre qa piouwini: n~tav~m/i e~tafi~ e~pikocmoc: n/eynah] e~pefran: auswpi n~s/ri n~te piouwini.
You have borne witness to the True Light, who came into the world, those who believed in His name, became children of the Light.
شهدت للنور الحقيقى الذى أتى الى العالم والذين يؤمنون باسمه صاروا أبناء النور.

Title.Language: Another Doxology for St. John the Baptist

Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. John the Baptist:

Text.Language: Afermeyre n~je Iwann/c: qen pif~tou n~euaggelion: je ai]wmc m~Pacwt/r: qen nimwou n~te Piiordan/c.
John has borne witness, in the four Gospels, saying “I have baptized my Savior, in the waters of the Jordan.
شهد يوحنا في الأناجيل الأربعة أنى عمدت مخلصي في مياه الاردن.
Ainau e~Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: e~tafi~ e~pec/t e~bol qen t~ve: aicwtem e~t~c~m/ n~te Viwt: ecws e~bol ecjw m~moc.
"I saw the Holy Spirit, come down from heaven, I heard the voice of the Father, proclaiming and saying,
ونظرت الروح القدس إذ هبط من السماء وسمعت صوت ألآب صارخا قائلا.
Je vai pe pas/ri pamenrit: e~ta ta'u,/ ]ma] n~q/tf: aferpaouws cwtem n~cwf: je n~yof pe pireftanqo.
'This is My beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased, He does My will listen to Him, for He is the giver of life.'"
هذا هو ابني حبيبي الذي سرت به نفسي وصنع مشيئتي اسمعوا له لأنه هو المحيى.
